txt.en: Deliver Zaugnakh's head to Elgur at Amdân

After encountering the mighty Warg, Zaugnakh, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

As you inspect Zaugnakh's head, you breathe a sigh of relief that the ferocious Warg will never again slay one of your kin. Although his rider, Komog, son of Azog, was slain some time ago at Mount Gundabad, it seems the Warg had pursued the Haban'akkâ of Thráin on their long journey to Azanulbizar.

You decide to bring this trophy to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim, that it might be preserved once the war is ended.

Elgur can be found at Amdân during the Battle of Azanulbizar in T.A. 2799.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe at Azanulbizar. You should deliver it to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim.
After encountering the mighty Warg, Zaugnakh, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

'What have you brought me now, Hermáth?'

You hand Zaugnakh's head to Elgur and he immediately recoils.

'Can it be, Hermáth? Zaugnakh is slain!

'This will make a fine trinket for Thráin! As Komog's skull adorns his standard, so too shall Zaugnakh's serve as a warning to Azog and his wretched kind!'
